name: Yukong

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

story: Head of the Sky-Faring Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu. Yukong was a seasoned pilot and a deadshot.Since heading up the commission, she's been buried under mountains of paperwork.

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

skills.name: Arrowslinger
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Emboldening Salvo
skills.description: Obtains 2 stacks of Roaring Bowstrings. All allies' ATK increases when Roaring Bowstrings is active on this character.

skills.name: Diving Kestrel
skills.description: When Roaring Bowstrings is active on this character, increases the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of all allies and deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Seven Layers, One Arrow
skills.description: Basic Attack additionally deals minor DMG, and the Toughness-Reducing DMG of this Basic Attack is increased. This effect can be triggered again after 1 turn have passed.

skills.name: Chasing the Wind
skills.description: Increases Movement Speed. After attacking an enemy and entering battle, receive 2 stacks of Roaring Bowstrings.

eidolons.name: Aerial Marshal
eidolons.description: At the start of battle, increases the SPD of all allies by 10% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Skyward Command
eidolons.description: When any ally's current energy is equal to its energy limit, Yukong regenerates an additional 5 energy. This effect can only be triggered once for each ally. The trigger count is reset after Yukong uses her Ultimate.

eidolons.name: Torrential Fusillade
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Zephyrean Echoes
eidolons.description: When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, Yukong deals 30% more DMG to enemies.

eidolons.name: August Deadshot
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Bowstring Thunderclap
eidolons.description: When Yukong uses her Ultimate, she immediately gains 1 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings."
